shows.title: Big Trouble In Little China
shows.desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean vulputate scelerisque lorem non vestibulum. Pellentesque pellentesque tincidunt augue at pretium.

shows.title: Blade
shows.desc: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

shows.title: Enemy of the State
shows.desc: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

shows.title: Hamburger Hill
shows.desc: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.

shows.title: In The Line Of Fire
shows.desc: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

shows.title: Kingdom Of Heaven
shows.desc: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

shows.title: Revenge Of The Ninja
shows.desc: After ninjas killed his family, Cho and his son Kane come to America to start a new life. He opens a doll shop but is unwittingly importing heroin in the dolls. When his friend betrays him, Cho must prepare for the ultimate battle.

shows.title: Smokey and the Bandit
shows.desc: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

shows.title: True Lies
shows.desc: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

shows.title: 9 to 5
shows.desc: Three secretaries turn the tables on their obnoxious boss.

shows.title: Its a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
shows.desc: A group of motorists witnesses a car crash in the California desert, and after the driver's dying words indicate the location of a hidden stash of loot, they turn against each other in a race across the state to get to it.

shows.title: Kung Pow: Enter The Fist
shows.desc: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parents death.

shows.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
shows.desc: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

shows.title: Stripes
shows.desc: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

shows.title: The Gods Must Be Crazy
shows.desc: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

shows.title: The Color Purple
shows.desc: A tale spanning forty years in the life of Celie, an African-American woman living in the South who survives incredible abuse and bigotry.

shows.title: Casablanca
shows.desc: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

shows.title: Cool Hand Luke
shows.desc: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

shows.title: Dead Poets Society
shows.desc: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

shows.title: Empire of the Sun
shows.desc: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

shows.title: Little Miss Sunshine
shows.desc: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

shows.title: Memento
shows.desc: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

shows.title: Shogun (miniseries)
shows.desc: An English navigator becomes both a player and pawn in the complex political games in feudal Japan.

shows.title: Three Days of the Condor
shows.desc: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

shows.title: The Neverending Story
shows.desc: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

shows.title: The Parent Trap
shows.desc: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

shows.title: Before Sunrise
shows.desc: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

shows.title: Dirty Dancing
shows.desc: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

shows.title: Jerry Maguire
shows.desc: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

shows.title: Notting Hill
shows.desc: A set of circumstances makes Anna Scott, a famous actress, fall in love with William Thacker, owner of a bookstore in Notting Hill. But the paparazzi's fascination with her complicates their bond.

shows.title: Pride and Prejudice (miniseries)
shows.desc: While the arrival of wealthy gentlemen sends her marriage-minded mother into a frenzy, willful and opinionated Elizabeth Bennet matches wits with haughty Mr. Darcy.

shows.title: Batteries Not Included
shows.desc: Aliens help a feisty old New York couple in their battle against the ruthless land developer who's out to evict them.

shows.title: Dune
shows.desc: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

shows.title: Galaxy Quest
shows.desc: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

shows.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
shows.desc: An alien lands in Washington, D.C. and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

shows.title: Jason And The Argonauts
shows.desc: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

shows.title: Race For Your Life Charlie Brown!
shows.desc: The Peanuts gang goes to summer camp, and they participate in a river-raft race against some cheating bullies.

shows.title: Gulliver's Travels
shows.desc: A doctor washes ashore on an island inhabited by little people.

shows.title: Superman (1978)
shows.desc: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

shows.title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
shows.desc: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

shows.title: Tarantula
shows.desc: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in gigantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

shows.title: Night of the Living Dead
shows.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

shows.title: McLintock!
shows.desc: Wealthy rancher G. W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

shows.title: The Nevadan
shows.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with an outlaw bank robber and a greedy rancher.

shows.title: Young Guns
shows.desc: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

shows.title: Young Guns II
shows.desc: Billy the Kid and his band of outlaws are pursued across New Mexico territory by Sheriff Pat Garrett, who the young gunslingers must face-off with if they are to reach the safety of the border.

shows.title: The Fury
shows.desc: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from a shadowy secret government agency.

shows.title: The Magic Sword
shows.desc: The son of a sorceress, armed with weapons, armor and six magically summoned knights, embarks on a quest to save a princess from a vengeful wizard.

shows.title: Tron (1982)
shows.desc: A computer hacker is abducted into a digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

shows.title: Soylent Green
shows.desc: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.
